definition: suffix of a noun of locality
extremely vast/boundless/limitless/digressing/discursive/going off on tangents/straying far off topic
The sea of bitterness has no bounds, turn your head to see the shore (idiom). Only Buddhist enlightenment can allow one to shed off the abyss of worldly suffering./Repent and ye shall be saved!
pinyin: ku3 hai3 wu2 bian1 , hui2 tou2 shi4 an4

sentences.english: The sea is the immensity of wretchedness.
Two meters four likely muddy boundless.
Among the endless icy mountains is Ilum's Crystal Cave.
sentences.chinese: 在無邊無際的冰封山脈中有伊冷的水晶洞。

sentences.english: And flung my eager craft through footless halls of air.
sentences.chinese: 將我的渴望擲向那無邊的空中。

sentences.english: He felt sick of the broad words of his colleagues' flirting.
sentences.chinese: 他同事調情時那些漫無邊際的話使他感到嘔心。

sentences.english: You can enjoy the extraordinary sight unbroken cloud plains that stretch out before you.
sentences.chinese: 你可以欣賞展現於面前一望無邊的奇特雲海。

sentences.english: Earth's oceans are wide-reaching and teeming with life.
sentences.chinese: 地球上的海洋無邊無際，且充滿了生命。

sentences.english: And every one of the Buddhas emits infinite and boundless light. These lights do not obstruct one another.
sentences.chinese: 每一個佛都是這樣子放光，無量無邊的。

sentences.english: I should not have to live my eternity away from my little spider .
sentences.chinese: 我不會離開我的小蜘蛛而孤悽地度過那無邊歲月的。

sentences.english: If the printer does not support borderless printing, the collection is empty.
sentences.chinese: 如果打印機不支持無邊打印，則集合爲空。

sentences.english: Love, in all its endlessness , unboundedness and failed definitions is this experience.
sentences.chinese: 這是一次無邊無境，無從定義的愛之旅。

sentences.english: Even if indifference, but he was always a limitless a faith gives teared up.
sentences.chinese: 縱使淡漠無邊，卻總有一種信仰讓淚流滿面。

sentences.english: That is because she has an immeasurable and boundless love to all living beings.
sentences.chinese: 自然是由於她有廣大無邊的愛了。

sentences.english: I will pay you by a smile and by the immense love I have had always for you.
sentences.chinese: 我將用微笑和我始終不變的無邊無際的愛來回報你。

sentences.english: Fields, green a boundless hope, as if the green wave.
sentences.chinese: 田野上，麥苗返青，一望無邊，彷彿綠色的波浪。

sentences.english: I'am in the drums loud and grand, the thundrous hooves across Nagra…
sentences.chinese: 我是威武雄壯的鼓，踏過草原無邊的納格蘭。

definition: to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
to hug/to cherish/within the bosom (of the family)/to embrace (also fig. an ideal, aspiration etc)
